這個選項只會在鎖屏上停用電源菜單

禁用來自這些應用程式的浮動通知
浮動通知將顯示 %d 秒

在螢幕關閉時才執行操作。螢幕開啟後會還原先前的狀態。

顯示網路速度指示器箭頭
使用從螢幕底部向上滑動的手勢進行導航操控
必須隱藏導航欄才能使用這些手勢。 向左 / 向右滑動以返回。 向上滑動以返回主頁。 向上滑動並停留一段時間以查看總覽
在快速設定面板中顯示亮度滑動條
在每個磁貼下方顯示標題
訪問設備特定的系統手勢
在狀態欄中自訂義時間和日期
在時間前面顯示自訂義日期
必須符合 DateFormat 格式 例如：MM/dd/yy
Hide and display clock for regular intervals
Display a warning when network is monitored by external apps or vpn
End the current call by pressing the power button
Enter a custom label. Leave blank to use your network name
Move display content when device is in motion
Show visualizer bars while playing music
Use a custom color instead of the auto generated color
Press volume keys to answer calls
Launch the default music app when headset is connected
Show an icon to toggle auto-brightness
Show the icon on right of the brightness slider
Show buttons beside the brightness slider to adjust brightness
充電時顯示電池欄顯示充電動畫
使用漸變顏色來顯示電池電量
合併信號和移動數據符號,類似 oreo 的圖示
移動狀態列圖標，以防止燒屏
編輯 Doze 配置設定

This is the time, after becoming inactive, at which we start looking at the motion sensor to determine if the device is being left alone. We don\'t do this immediately after going inactive just because we don\'t want to be continually running the significant motion sensor whenever the screen is off

If we don\'t receive a callback from AnyMotion in this amount of time + locating_to, we will change from STATE_SENSING to STATE_INACTIVE, and any AnyMotion callbacks while not in STATE_SENSING will be ignored
This is how long we will wait to try to get a good location fix before going in to idle mode
The desired maximum accuracy (in meters) we consider the location to be good enough to go on to idle. We will be trying to get an accuracy fix at least this good or until locating_to expires
This is the time, after seeing motion, that we wait after becoming inactive from that until we start looking for motion again
This is the time, after the inactive timeout elapses, that we will wait looking for significant motion until we truly consider the device to be idle
This is the initial time, after being idle, that we will allow ourself to be back in the IDLE_PENDING state allowing the system to run normally until we return to idle
Maximum pending idle timeout (time spent running) we will be allowed to use
Scaling factor to apply to current pending idle timeout each time we cycle through that state
This is the initial time that we want to sit in the idle state before waking up again to return to pending idle and allowing normal work to run
Maximum idle duration we will be allowed to use
Scaling factor to apply to current idle timeout each time we cycle through that state
This is the minimum time we will allow until the next upcoming alarm for us to actually go in to idle mode
Max amount of time to temporarily whitelist an app when it receives a high tickle
Amount of time we would like to whitelist an app that is receiving an MMS
Amount of time we would like to whitelist an app that is receiving an SMS
This is the time, after becoming inactive, that we go in to the first light-weight idle mode
This is amount of time we will wait from the point where we decide we would like to go idle until we actually do, while waiting for jobs and other current activity to finish
This is the initial time that we will run in idle maintenance mode
Scaling factor to apply to the light idle mode time each time we complete a cycle
This is the maximum time we will run in idle maintenence mode
This is the minimum amount of time we want to make available for maintenance mode when lightly idling
This is the maximum amount of time we want to make available for maintenance mode when lightly idling
This is the minimum amount of time that we will stay in maintenance mode after a light doze
This is the minimum amount of time that we will stay in maintenance mode after a full doze
Amount of time we would like to whitelist an app that is handling a notification
Maintenance mode light idle min timeout
Maintenance mode light idle max timeout
Maintenance mode light doze min timeout
Maintenance mode full doze min timeout
No kernel wakelock stats file /proc/wakelocks or /sys/kernel/debug/wakeup_sources found.
Press reset to start collecting time in state data
Press reset to start collecting wakelock data
Please unplug power to get wakelock data
No states file found. Are you sure your phone is compatible?\n\nIf you are running a custom ROM or kernel, try contacting its developer to inform him that the states file is not readable.

Shows date at the top while in immersive

Show left/right shortcuts on secure lock screens
Show charging information and unlock hints
Show lock icon on the bottom
Show indicators when Wi-Fi is sending/receiving data like mobile
Display the number of pending notifications
Useful if the device actually has rounded corners
Show heads up only for dialer or messaging app
Shows information on top of the QS panel
Change the enter/exit animation of the power menu
Will give your sms notifications a breathing effect in the status bar
Will give your missed call notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your voicemail notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Control ring volume with volume keys instead of media volume

Take screenshot when Power + Volume Down buttons are pressed
When fast charging, use different color till 90% charged
Gradually change colors between full and empty

Tap here to add, tap on added app to remove it

Choose the default behavior when connected to a device via USB

Set QS background color from System Accent

Display date, weather, alarms and zen
Use default statusbar height in Hide
Display the tile edit icon in quick settings footer

Show animated feedback on edges when back gesture is used

For better visibility on bright images

Not all squeeze actions within Active Edge have the capability to activate the display
Show multiuser switch on the statusbar

Changing the icon shape will only affect new started apps. Thus, it is recommended to reboot your device to fully apply this setting. If some apps still use the old shape after that, try clearing their app cache.
